summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5908 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 6, Lafayette Place Addition, being the alley between 17th Avenue South and Lafayette Avenue, from Horton Street to Hinds Street; and certain other alleys and streets, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 77961, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
